name: Wild Workshop
description:
🍌A vast island: There is a wide diversity of landforms and creatures on the uninhabited island. You can explore a bright green grassland, the broad desert, beautiful mountains, hot volcanos, and the clear blue sea. Turn the savage island into your lovely home!

🍌Develop the island: In the beginning, the island has nothing on its top. There are plenty of works to do, such as putting up a farm, building houses, placing facilities, and so on. Little by little, you can turn the island into your ideal homestead.

🍌Indulge in beautiful sceneries of different seasons: On this island, the sceneries vary from season to season. You will be immersed in the landscape of the lively spring, the energetic summer, the breezy autumn, and the snowy winter.

🍌Customize your character appearance: There are thousands of appearances to choose from for your character. Also, there are several colors to pick for the eyes, the skin, the hair, and the clothes of your character. Your character can look just like you, or your ideal appearance.

🍌Have fun with the farm life: On the island, you can start a farm anywhere you like. Enjoy the full course of the farm life. Moreover, you can raise animals and have fun with them.

🍌Enjoy fishing everywhere: You can enjoy a peaceful time catching all the fishes. There are many kinds of fish in the river, the lake, and the sea. Not only you can go fishing here and there, but you can set up fish traps to catch crabs and oysters.

🍌Go treasure hunting in caves: The caves are enormous, and they are full of valuable treasures. Get into the caves and find rare gemstones and materials.

🍌Make amazing DIYs: With all the materials and food collected, you can craft tools and make dishes. Have fun with collecting stuff and improve your DIY skills!

🍌Decorate your lovely cozy home: There are various kinds of furniture and decorations to set up in your home. You can build your house at your favorite place and decorate it!
